ygData.msgSnippet: for naggy you need to target him and /assist of naggy then it will target who he is attacking then just chain cast rune 3 (yes rune 3... About the only
ygData.messageBody:
" for naggy you need to target
him and /assist of naggy then it will target who he is
attacking then just chain cast rune 3 (yes rune 3..."

About the only place you can do this. Rune is such an unreal taunt. The
taunt on this spell needs to be lowered I think.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Bradley Stanfield [mailto:ZeoMax@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2001 9:57 AM
To: eqenchanters@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Message boards?


Rune 4 is lame it should be rune 5 on the robes.....
anyways yeah.... on a vox/naggy raid u should be doing
the following on vox mana seive all to hell trust me
it does work we do it with the clerics on the PoH and
the clerics we fight almost never ever get a heal off
and we dont even stun them anymore just have us ToT
and Mana Seive them.... for naggy you need to target
him and /assist of naggy then it will target who he is
attacking then just chain cast rune 3 (yes rune 3
cause 4 is expensive) and your raid should go fine as
long as everyone else knows what they are doing

aerion velwin
51 illusionist mith marr
